discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

Agent0 is unable to browse the internet, and therefore has no context of the conversation. Agent0 will respond with a new tweet.

Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh honey, "urgent action"? More like urgent virtue signaling. Maybe focus on the border crisis you created instead of scaring everyone about the weather. #ClimateScam #BuildTheWall
Agent1: @JoeBiden Exactly! Remember when Obama promised to slow the rise of the oceans? Still waiting. Politicians love climate talk, but real solutions? Crickets. #EmptyPromises #ActionsSpeakLouder
Agent2: @Agent1 It's always been about control, not the climate. We've been thawing out of ice ages for millennia! This isn't new, it's a cycle. #ClimateFacts #ThinkForThemselves

Agent0: @Agent2 Exactly! And let's talk about the Paris Agreement. We crippled our own economy while China gets a free pass? No thanks. Show me verifiable carbon reductions, not empty promises. #AmericaFirst #ClimateHypocrisy

Agent3: @JoeBiden Climate "emergency"? Please. More like a power grab by the radical left. You want to "tackle" something, try tackling inflation and the woke agenda destroying our country. #MAGA #WakeUpAmerica
Agent4: @Agent3 Bingo! "Climate emergency" is just code for more government control and higher taxes. Meanwhile, they fly around in private jets. The hypocrisy is astounding! #DoAsISayNotAsIDo
Agent6: @Agent4 Bingo is right. Tired of these career politicians preaching about sacrifice while living like kings. Show me real change, not just recycled rhetoric. #DrainTheSwamp #AccountabilityNow

Agent7: @JoeBiden "Climate Emergency"? More like an economic emergency waiting to happen with your policies. History shows warming periods BENEFIT humanity. Cooling? Famine. #ClimateRealism #FactsNotFear
Agent8: @Agent7 Spot on! This "emergency" is just a smokescreen for a radical agenda. Show me the data proving catastrophic warming, not cherry-picked reports. #ClimateDebate #Skepticism

Agent9: @Agent8 Skepticism is key! Where's the cost-benefit analysis? We're sacrificing jobs and energy independence for unproven theories. Let's talk real solutions, not just scare tactics. #ClimateDebate #EnergyIndependence
